metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14409 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has an Integer Overflow (and resultant SDL_memcpy heap corruption) in SDL_BlitCopy in video/SDL_blit_copy.c via a crafted .BMP file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> for libsdl1.2, this was fixed by CVE-2019-7637

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.14+dfsg2-3').
